name: EV Charging Station Installation
description: Professional installation of Level 2 EV charging stations for Tesla, Rivian, Ford, BMW, and all electric vehicle brands. We handle load assessments, dedicated circuit installation, panel upgrades if needed, and ensure fast, safe charging with code-compliant wiring.
shortDescription: Tesla & universal EV charger installation for home and business
features: Tesla Wall Connector and universal Level 2 chargers
Full electrical load assessment and capacity planning
Panel upgrades if required for charger demand
